channel.title: Resources on Davide Vega D'Aurelio
channel.description: Recent content in Resources on Davide Vega D'Aurelio

item.title: Temporal Text Network Library
item.description:
The ttnet (Temporal Text Network Library) is a python open source package for modelling and analizing communication networks, built on top of the uunet – the core library for network modelling and analysis developed and maintained by the Uppsala University Information Laboratory . ttnet is still in an early (but continuous) development.

The library is based on the Foundations of Temporal Text Networks and Metrics for Temporal Text Networks papers.

item.title: hugo-Uppsala Theme
item.description:
The hugo-Uppsala is an academic theme I developed over the years to build my personal webpage. This theme has been inspited by the Hugo Finisterre theme by Jonathan Gilligan and some other academics’ personal pages I have visited in the past.

The theme supports most of the features from Hugo Finisterre, such as the automatic generation of publication lists from BibTeX files and the dynamic generation of news in the homepage.

In contrast, this Hugo Finisterre it is a more lightweight theme redesigned from scratch using Bootstrap 5, Bootstrap Icons and SASS.

item.title: Uppsala University Network Library
item.description:
The uunet (Uppsala University Network Library) is the C++ open source core library for network modelling and analysis developed and maintained by the Uppsala University Information Laboratory . The library is fully documented and includes a comperhensive test suite with examples that demonstrate how it can be used or extended.

This library also provides most of the code behind the R and Python multinet libraries, which are more specialized.

The multinet R library

The multinet library is available on CRAN (the Comprehensive R Archive Network), and can be installed directly from an R terminal or RStudio.
